Package pulse.math

Class AbstractIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pulse.util.UpwardsNavigable
      • pulse.util.Group
        • pulse.util.Accessible
          • pulse.util.PropertyHolder
            • pulse.math.AbstractIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Descriptive, Reflexive
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositionProduct, FixedIntervalIntegrator
    public abstract class AbstractIntegrator
extends PropertyHolder
implements Reflexive
    An AbstractIntegrator serves to calculate the definite integral of a function. It defines the integration bounds in the form of a Segment and two abstract methods, one to calculate the integrand as a function of one or more variables and the other to actually do the integration.

      Creates an AbstractIntegrator with the specified integration bounds.
